note:
Govindam Yoga, as a Yoga School in Rishikesh India, is influenced & empowered by the teachings of the enlightening Vedic Scriptures and the great Sages of ancient India, which reflect in our deliverance of the pristine teachings of Yoga.
We offer authentic yoga teacher training in Rishikesh & yoga retreats in the foothills of the majestic Himalayas, which is considered to be the best place for yoga & meditation in India.

name: Spirituality
value: Yogic wisdom from the authentic source
